verses.name: Jeremiah 25:8
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord of hosts; Because ye have not heard my words,

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:9
verses.text: Behold, I will send and take all the families of the north, saith the Lord, and Nebuchadrezzar the king of Babylon, my servant, and will bring them against this land, and against the inhabitants thereof, and against all these nations round about, and will utterly destroy them, and make them an astonishment, and an hissing, and perpetual desolations.
